name: De:Stress
description:
Stressed? Let us help you! Put your VR Headset and release your stress by smashing glass using a bat, popping balloons using a gun, shooting an enemy spaceship using a laser gun, etc. De:Stress features 5 minigames for you to choose from. 

De:Stress' minigames:
  1. Baloon Popper
  2. Glass Smash
  3. Space Saver
  4. Fire Extinguisher
  5. Shoot Em' Targets
Controls:
  • Touch to interact with the buttons
Note:

This game was made by Team Tr0jan in 3 months for our Capstone/Thesis project.

Made with Unity and SteamVR. Tested with HTC Vive, We haven't tested its compatibility with other headsets.
